SENT.plain: BACKGROUND: Moyamoya disease with pregnancy is rare and might present with cerebral hemorrhage
CASE: A 22-year-old primigravida suddenly developed muscular weakness in the right arm and facial discomfort 3 days after cesarean
Computed tomography and cerebrovascular angiography found cerebral infarction attributable to moyamoya disease
Bilateral anastomosis of superficial temporal and middle cerebral arteries was done
CONCLUSION: Moyamoya disease with pregnancy might present as cerebral infarction after cesarean
